name: impersonator detonator
description:
You are a secret agent in a small English village occupied by a secret society called  'The Wolves'.

You are tasked with identifying and eliminating 'The Wolves' without harming the locals.

The British government have equipped you with a state-of-the-art anti-personnel explosive device.

Be diligent, Agent, the enemy are masters of disguise so - TRUST NO ONE.

Created in 72 hours for the BenBonk Game Jam on my lonesome - with music supplied by Bingo Flangeworthy.

Link for BenBonk playing the game!
